Class ByteBufferWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • tachyon.io.ByteBufferWriter

    JavaByteBufferWriter

    public abstract class ByteBufferWriter
extends Object
    Writer for bytebuffer.

        public static ByteBufferWriter getByteBufferWriter(ByteBuffer buf)
                                            throws IOException
        Get most efficient ByteBufferWriter for the ByteBuffer.
        Parameters:
        buf - the ByteBuffer to write.
        Returns:
        The most efficient ByteBufferWriter for buf.
        Throws:
        IOException

        public abstract void put(Byte b)
        Writes the given byte into this buffer at the current position, and then increments the position.
        Parameters:
        b - The byte to be written

      • put

        public final void put(byte[] src)
        This method transfers the entire content of the given source byte array into this buffer. An invocation of this method of the form dst.put(a) behaves in exactly the same way as the invocation 
         dst.put(a, 0, a.length)
        Parameters:
        src -
